Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
com.example.muhammad.chambers.c482.pa.controller.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class holds the functionality for the Main Menu. FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: 1.Improve the UI, 2.Refactor code, 3.Add a database for persistent data.
